original_title: A Tail of Two Cities: Gov't Mule
overview: Disc 1 - Recorded at The Orpheum Theatre, Boston, MA on 10/15/04.  Disc 2 - Recorded at The Riviera Theatre, Chicago, IL on 12/9/06. With booklet.  Total Running Time: 5:01:56 Special Features:  Stereo/5.1  Optional On-Screen Lyrics  "Million Miles From Yesterday" Music Video  Photo Gallery Picture Format: 4x3
title: A Tail of Two Cities: Gov't Mule
